::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus transformes to his RV mode and heads towards the lower exit tunnel where teams 1 and 2 will meet.

After a few minutes of driving, he arrives and transformes to bot mode.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  Elita/Nighlight
 
 "I understand daddy"said the child a little annoying that all treat 
 her as a... Child.
 
 "Take care you too"whispered Nightlight while she huged Rodimus and 
 kissed him back"remember that we're waitting you"
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > ::Rodimus Prime::
 > 
 > Rodimus was doing the same, tracking the signal, when he met up 
 with his family.
 > 
 > Rodimus: There you two are. I just wanted to check up on you before 
 we deal with that Predacon. You both help the city defense. Team 
 three essentially.
 > 
 > He looks at Elita.
 > 
 > Rodimus: I want you to stay with your mother and help with the 
 defenses within the city. You'll best help that way. If by some 
 chance the Pred makes it into the city, I want you to take cover. No 
 heroics on this one. Understand, hunny?
 > 
 > Rodimus looks back to his wife.
 > 
 > Rodimus: I got to go meet up with my team at the exit tunnel and 
 take position on the entrence ramp. Be careful. I love you both.
 > 
 > Rodimus hugs his daughter and kisses his wife.
 >
